total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the pattern of the color distribution in the input grids of the examples.
Q2: Determine the color that is used to fill the outermost layer of the pattern.
Q3: Identify the color that is used to fill the innermost layer of the pattern.
Q4: Determine the color that is used to fill the middle layer of the pattern.
Q5: Identify the position of the pattern in the input grid.
Q6: Apply the same color distribution to the quiz input grid based on the position of the pattern.
Q7: Fill the outermost layer of the pattern in the quiz input grid with the color identified in Q2.
Q8: Fill the middle layer of the pattern in the quiz input grid with the color identified in Q4.
Q9: Fill the innermost layer of the pattern in the quiz input grid with the color identified in Q3.

Q1: Identify the area in the grid that is surrounded by the number 3.
Q2: Identify the number that is inside the area surrounded by 3s.
Q3: Replace the outer layer of 0s that are directly adjacent to the area surrounded by 3s with the number identified in Q2.
Q4: Replace the remaining 0s in the grid that are not adjacent to the area surrounded by 3s with the number identified in Q2.
